page.title: 19Local News In Aboyne
page.content: The{Media}in Aboyne consists of the two local{newspapers}_ "The Deesider" and the "Piper". These are both distributed free around the area and carry most of the{local news}as well as other features of local interest. Both newspapers carry a timetable of Deeside{events}for the coming month as both are published monthly. "The Deesider" is the more established publication, "The Piper" only being about a year old, but because it publishes photographs it is just as widely read as the less well printed "Deesider". Also widely read are the two Aberdeen journals _ "The Press and Journal" and "The Evening Express". These are two 'sister' newspapers that carry worldwide news as well as news and articles more exclusive to the Aboyne Area.
